website_summaries.verdict: A well-made, affordable pogo stick that's versatile for a variety of ages. A good choice when it comes to both quality and value.
pros: Padded handles are easy to grip
Using a helmet adds to safety
cons: Requires a break-in period as the spring is stiff at first
No indicated weight limit, but owners over 120 lbs
report being able to use it

customer_reviews.title: Gambled and failed.  Stiff, not much bounce, and short spring action.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when the price dropped below $30 and took a gamble. I teach elementary PE and I have other pogo sticks (Mavericks) and they are better. This Razor I wen't off the reputation of their scooters. This pogo stick is really stiff (I'm 180 lbs. and it was stiff for my weight). Also, the bottom portion does not go down very far to allow much bounce, which it seems like it goes down several inches less than my other pogos. I do like the folding handles/pedals which does allow easier storage if it matters to you, which it does for me when I have multiple pogo sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Not good for young kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pogo stick to my dear nephew who is 7 years olds. He was excited when he just received it, but after few minutes, he was not happy anymore. This pogo stick is too hard to him for use. Maybe, it was not design for young kids. Only the good thing: the construction of pogo stick is sturdy. It is not easy to break. If u want buy it to ur children, u need to make sure ur children has enough power to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Minion

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! So much fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! So much fun; sturdy and well made! I tried it but it was actually for my son's 10th birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Better suited for heavier kids, but my daughter likes it. She's 9 and weighs 79 lbs so I didn't want to get her the other brand which goes up to 80lbs. This will last her a while. Only complaint is that the metal pole bruises her by her knees from knocking her. It's strong and good quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Headon-Weeks

customer_reviews.title: At first, this pogo stick was a little stiff ...
customer_reviews.text: At first, this pogo stick was a little stiff for my 85 lb, 10 year old son. He even knocked the inside of his knees a few times. But the more he jumped on it, the looser it got, and the less he hit his knees. He jumps everywhere, from the house, to the car, even down the stairs. He's given me a few scares, but he loves to jump on this pogo stick. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy. My children are within the weight limits of ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. My children are within the weight limits of this product but they can barely move it. I definitely would recommend it for the upper end of the weight limit.
customer_reviews.author: magmom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but hard to jump for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 3 star only because of the spring pressure of the item. My 10 year old, almost 70 lbs can barely jump on this. The spring is so tight, I am guessing you need to weight quite a bit more to get it to really jump well. He used it twice and gave up. Otherwise, it is a sturdy, strong product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S Bush

customer_reviews.title: Very solidly made product and my nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a stiffer spring on this one. My nephew just turned 7, and he's a bigger kid. It's tough for him but he gets better at it everyday...the spring rate will lessen over time from fatigue, and he will grow heavier. So, I see it as something durable that he will not outgrow anytime soon. Very solidly made product and my nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Finally Delivered!
customer_reviews.text: The pogo stick finally arrived. My 9 year old athletic granddaughter had no problem with it. A few hours after finally receiving her Razor she was rocking it!! I ordered this Razo pogo stick yesterday and was told it would arrive today. No one calls to inform me, oops it’s not coming today after all. The kids are at the window watching the the delivery. I just called Amazon and was told, sorry it’s coming tomorrow. It’s common courtesy to call and inform me that once again, next day delivery really means, maybe it will be delivered or maybe it won’t.
customer_reviews.author: M. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: fun pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Razor Gogo Pogo Stick is a fun pogo stick. Kids love using it and jumping with it. It's a fun game that can be used either indoors or outdoors. Perfect for a very active child forced to stay indoors. It's a good, fun way for them to use their energy. This pogo stick works very well. It's strong and sturdy and doesn't seem like it will break at all any time soon. They never get bored of it. It's the perfect toy. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Not bouncy or easy to use for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids and was surprised how sturdy and non bouncy and springy it was... its hard to use and takes a lot of force to bounce. hard to balance... very sturdy and durable i guess but we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey F

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, fun
customer_reviews.text: This was gotten as a gift for my 10 year old. With all the stay at home restrictions, she needed new outlets to burn off energy as all her normal sports and activities have been cancelled due to covid. This was very easy for my daughter to take to and at just over 80 lbs now, I expect this (140 lb weight capacity) to last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Vieira

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my eleven-year-old daughter and at age 13 she still loves it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pogo stick for my daughter, and wasn't disappointed. She used it often and it withstood her abuse. I would recommend. My daughter was 11 when I bought it, and she still uses it at age 13.
customer_reviews.author: meljo

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: This pogo stick is just what our daughter wanted. It takes a bit for it to loosen up and bounce as expected. It also works best if the kiddo is over 60 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Alysha Herpel

customer_reviews.title: but it'll loosen and he'll enjoy it for years to come
customer_reviews.text: It's a little tough for my 10 year old "skinny" son to get enough weight to bounce it, but it'll loosen and he'll enjoy it for years to come! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: J. Call

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pogo Stick
customer_reviews.text: This pogo stick is extremely sturdy. It is definitely made for older children. To some it might seem a tad heavy, but I am very impressed with this pogo stick. An added feature is that the feet and handles fold down to store easily.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get air☹️
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6. He worked his last pogo stick to breaking. He’s a darn good pogo-Er. This one is so tight. You literally only bounce like an inch or two off the ground. My husband and I both tried and and you just can’t get any air. My boy was super disappointed ☹️. The cheaper ones work way better.
customer_reviews.author: Carv

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very hard springs making it hard for my 9 yr old to bounce easily
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: ... I would have to say that it stands up nicely through a lot of wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pogo stick for my daughter two years ago for Christmas and she is still using it so I would have to say that it stands up nicely through a lot of wear and tear! My daughter was 13 then and is 15 now and it still holds up to her use so hopefully that helps anyone trying to decide what age this can be be used for.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Works great and child loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old son loves this. He learned it super quick. It is so cool. No issues with it being too hard to bounce. My son is tall and thin so he doesn't have a lot of strength but handles this with ease. The spring does not seem to be too tight as I read in previous reviews. It was definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price, nice shipping and strong. My ten year is the size of a 14 year old and this fits him fine.
customer_reviews.author: annabelle morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 45 lb 7 yo son cannot move the spring yet to make it bounce but he still loves to try. I can jump on it without issue so I use it and I weigh 125 lbs. still love it!
customer_reviews.author: CSale

customer_reviews.title: Spring too strong
customer_reviews.text: The pogo stick was too strong for our 7 year ago granddaughter. She was not heavy enough and could not compress the springs. I felt bad she could not use it. It was a present.
customer_reviews.author: allan

customer_reviews.title: Way Sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just opened this up, and my daughter and her children started playing on it, they Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: The Razor pogo stick is just what our 7-year old granddaughter wanted for her birthday. She weighs 47 pounds and the spring is tight for her weight. She probably needs to gain another 10 pounds to compress the spring. Nevertheless, she is completely happy and over time it will only get better.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little bit of weight to ride
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 160 and it’s a fun ride but my cousin only weighs 110 and had problems with the tension being too tight
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: My kid's love it!
customer_reviews.text: Both, my 13 year old daughter and 10 year old son, love this thing. I gave it a try and enjoyed it as well. As many others have mentioned, my daughter ended up with bruise on the inside of her knee. This is much better quality than the previous pogo stick that we bought for about the same cost. They lost a star for the knee issue.
customer_reviews.author: Giant Supporter

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty sturdy but kind of stiff compared to some my son has tried. He’s 10 and it’s the perfect size for him. Be aware it only can hold up to like 150 lbs so my husband is a little bummed he can’t play without potentially breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Michela Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. However spring is very stiff. Anyone under 80lb will have trouble getting a decent bounce from this.
customer_reviews.author: George Gore

customer_reviews.title: ... pound self -- not many toys we can share like that! My daughter had to be very diligent ...
customer_reviews.text: This works well for both my 65 pound daughter and my 140 pound self -- not many toys we can share like that! My daughter had to be very diligent at first to get it to work well with her her lower weight, but figured it out and currently holds the family pogo stick jumping championship title at 147 consecutive jumps.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneWhoBoughtStuff

customer_reviews.title: Pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Well made but difficult for my 8 year old grandson to use. Very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it...well made. He is 12 and picked up on it immediately
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Good unit.  Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and her brother and sister love this. At 8 years old she will need a little time to master it but it provides a great workout for her.
customer_reviews.author: tiger76

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons enjoy it. The 12 year old can use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons enjoy it. The 12 year old can use it easily but be aware that smaller children (age 8) may not be heavy enough to compress the spring
customer_reviews.author: M. Sheldrick

customer_reviews.title: while razor is a good brand for scooters
customer_reviews.text: wish i'd believed the majority of reviews...while razor is a good brand for scooters, this pogo stick won't bounce. spring coil is much too tight for a child, even a 150 lb adult won't push it enough to bounce. ended up having to buy a 2nd pogo stick from a consignment store for $5!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: stiff for small children
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and will last forever I'm sure. My daughter is almost 9 and on the thin side 50lbs. so it's a bit difficult to get any bounce action out of it. I'm sure once she gains some weight and learns to balance better, she will be able to use it. I would give it a 4 for it's great construction and durability but do to not being able to use it yet it gets a 3.
customer_reviews.author: KrisD Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Great pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Definitely takes someone heavy to break it in but it’s a great pogo stick for my 7 year old that he could use till he’s 14 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda K

customer_reviews.title: Will be lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a little stuff for our granddaughter but she’ll grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff.  Needs to be a little easier for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Too stiff. Not good for small kids. Needs to be broken in at the factory before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: I like that the handle bars and foot pegs fold for ...
customer_reviews.text: Stiff and hard to use for a 150 lb adult, so I would go with a different option for a child. I like that the handle bars and foot pegs fold for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Another great Razor product
customer_reviews.text: 1 2 3 setup - comes out of the box and you're basically ready to bounce around. Takes time to learn.... so be prepared with where you are practicing. Recommend protective gear if you have a younger child. My child is 9 and seems able to control her falls.... but I can see this toy being dangerous so we are careful where we practice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Millet

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves this thing. Seems sturdy and strong. Spring seems good and stiff as well
customer_reviews.author: Edward S. Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Razor Pogo Stick
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this pogo stick. I ordered this for my 8 year old & he couldn't even jump on it. It is way too hard for a kid his age. I would have returned it but it was $18!! Half of what I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pogo Stick!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed pogo stick. I like how it's sleek so nothing will jab your legs. My son got it for Christmas because he'd outgrown his smaller one. He's an excellent pogo jumper. He LOVES this pogo stick.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great quality pogo stick!
customer_reviews.text: My son saved his money for this pogo stick and I was concerned that due to the cost this would break or not be what he was looking for, I couldn't have been more wrong! This is a well made, sturdy pogo stick. He loves it and I love that it is so high quality! Great deal especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This sucks. It doesn't work. Springs are HORRIBLE. NO bounce. Can't use. Not worth your money. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Spring is too stiff! I was misled by the weight specs.
customer_reviews.text: The spring is so stiff! I chose this pogo stick because the age and weight range suited my 10 year old son. I emailed the company and they blew me off. Turned me off of Razor products for good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty to stiff for a 9 year old girl
customer_reviews.author: david volpe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic- tough as nails and daughters love it- my slight 10yo is able to compress it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic- tough as nails and daughters love it- my slight 10yo is able to compress it just fine and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: RJ B.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and quality, but stiff. Wish it gave more bounce. My 7 year old isn't heavy enough to compress the spring very far. That said, he used it in the talent show at school to rave review. <3
customer_reviews.author: crice

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old nephew loves it. Me being a 170lb uncle... not so much. Tried it and it was fun. Not much spring for adults... but it wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: rayzredge

customer_reviews.title: Happy birthday boy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 10 year old nephew from his Amazon birthday wish list. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joe/Mallory English

customer_reviews.title: This pogo stick is terrible. My kids weigh over 100 lbs but they ...
customer_reviews.text: This pogo stick is terrible. My kids weigh over 100 lbs but they can hardly bounce it at all. There are much more bouncy pogo sticks out there, don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bramwell

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to use straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brindley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: An awesome, durable product. My kids love it. Made very, durable and definitely worth the price. I would absolutely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, barely any bounce.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son and it is STIFF. It’s so stiff, there isn’t much bounce to it resulting in an unhappy child and unhappy mom. Did I mention it’s stiffness because it’s STIFF 😂
customer_reviews.author: Misty Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He’s around 80 pounds and it’s the right level of bounciness for him.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Mom

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: sturdy piece of equipment. my daughter is 9, a little bigger than most, and strong. she has no problem using it. her lighter friend can't do it b.c she doesn't have the strength/weight to make it move up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great pogo stick for bigger kids
customer_reviews.text: Really quality pogo stick for an older kid. My 7 year old is not heavy enough to be able to use it very easily so we will keep it around for when the kids get a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good pogo stick. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: My 70 pound 9 year old has no problems bouncing on this pogo stick. Was a light stiff but My 190 pound husband jumped on it a few times and it was fine for her after that. Feels sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Neisie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was extremely pleased and was just what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Although rest of the construction is good and is a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: The spring in this stick is extremely stiff so it does not make a jump. Even for an adult weight it is very stiff. Although rest of the construction is good and is a bit heavy. I had to return it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with quality and price, but the springs are a bit too hard for my sons (6 & 8 years old)
customer_reviews.author: RicardoC

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it, however the spring is a little tight ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, however the spring is a little tight and tough to jump on. Not sure if it's because of the cold or maybe the kids (ages 10 and 12) don't weigh enough, but even for myself the spring seems to be kind of tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Fun, different gift
customer_reviews.text: What a fun gift! The kid I purchased this for had never heard of a pogo stick and he has been bouncing around the neighborhood for about a month. Nice to find something for kids to do that doesn't encourage sitting on the couch:)
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Frye

customer_reviews.title: The 8 year old I gave it to loved it.
customer_reviews.text: For a vintage toy concept, it is trans generational. The 8 year old I gave it to loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 9 year old! Best gift! I recommend some knee pads to add on, it's painful to get the hang of it but once they do, they won't stop! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To stiff. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: We got it for a eight eight year old and it was so stiff an adult could not even use it, there is no adjustment for spring stiffness. It might work if over two hundred pound. USELESS!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lamadrid

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: my son weighs around 80 pounds and has no problem getting this to bounce. He loves it. And it seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Persephone Bullock

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR A 6 YEAR OLD AS SHOWN ON THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: LISTED AS OK FOR A 6 YEAR OLD...I THINK THIS SHOULD ONLY BE RECOMMENDED FOR ADULT USE. I BOUGHT IT FOR CHRISTMAS FOR MY SIX-YR OLD ADVENTUROUS GRAND-DAUGHTER WHO WAS OBSESSED WITH GETTING A POGO STICK. WE TRIED TO TRY IT OUT BEFORE WE WRAPPED IT AND IT WAS DIFFICULTY FOR THE ADULTS TO USE. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS FOR CHILDREN YOUNGER THAN 12 YRS OLD.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen T Alcoser

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my 6 year old but it’s peobably better for 8+
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old but it’s peobably better for 8+.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but read reviews before order
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but read reviews before order. Doesn't work for small children, only teens. Very tight mechanism, I'd say have to be over 100 pounds to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Tamaratx

customer_reviews.title: Kind of heavy but once the kids start bouncing, they are fine.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It's sturdy but easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: I love this pogo stick because it gives me excursive
customer_reviews.text: I love this pogo stick because it gives me excursive, its fun and I'm up to 600 jumps without falling.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old weighs 120lb and he loves this. It is light but solid with a strong spring.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. One of the only Christmas gifts he uses everyday. Well made and sturdy. We were pleased with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper's Mom

customer_reviews.title: My kids are to light for the pogo stick - ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids are to light for the pogo stick - no chance to use it - I cannot use it either - its horrible

customer_reviews.title: but anticipates having a good time with it

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Heavy duty. 11 year old love it and it looks like it will last for years.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pogo stick. Solid and well made. No part to put together. It was ready to use right out the box.

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids love it, but very hard to use in the beginning as it's very 'stiff'
customer_reviews.author: Birdie

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Pogo Stick
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 10 year old son. He's about 90 pounds and very hard on equipment. This is rated to 140 pounds so this was a great match with some room for him to grow. Stick is very good quality and after a month is holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my grandson for Christmas, and he immediately ran outside with it (in his Christmas pajamas) and bounced on the driveway for 15 minutes. He will try to break his own record of 1,040 times at a friends house this past fall. He will, too, lol.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynCAG

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased for a 6 year old boy. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a 6 year old boy. After attempting to bounce, he realized that there was no give in the spring. I called Razor and they told me to give it a week. After several weeks (and attempts to loosen it) , it remains basically unused.
customer_reviews.author: Sharpie

customer_reviews.title: Has been sturdy and have had no problems at all with it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Has been sturdy and have had no problems at all with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah A

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. My 7 year old can work it and jumps for hours. The square shape does make bruises on the inside of his knees but now that he is better at it, his knees don't hit the pole as much.
customer_reviews.author: Kjg

customer_reviews.title: My 11 & 12 year old boys asked for pogo ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 & 12 year old boys asked for pogo sticks for Christmas. They both lost interest about 5 minutes after trying to hop. It was very difficult for them and they both are very athletic.

customer_reviews.title: This pogo is very well made! I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This pogo is very well made! I bought it for my daughters Christmas. She was to heavy for the small, cheaper ones. So, I picked this out for they weight limit. She was 100lbs at the time. She was not able to work it. It is more suited for a teenager.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are correct, the spring is very resistant making ...
customer_reviews.text: Reviews are correct, the spring is very resistant making it challenging for my 7 year old girls to use. She's very strong, but doesn't quite have the weight to make the spring go down. In time, I think.

customer_reviews.title: a hit!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 9 year old grandsons birthday. I was concerned that his small size may have been a problem with him using, he is 60 pounds. Absolutely wasn't a problem. He loved it, and that makes me very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He is 8 and has no problem using it.

customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 11year old daughter and it was too short. She gave it to her 9year old sister and it broke on her same day. Don't waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son got this and he is 11 and loves it.

customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper..

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pogo stick for my 8 year old. He is 80 pounds and has no trouble at all with it. Several others have tried it as well and done well with it. From 50 lbs to 190 lbs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mailkirsten

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's 9th birthday. I'm not sure who had more fun, the kids or the adults. I see us having years of fun from this toy.
customer_reviews.author: mom24

customer_reviews.title: this is not for small kids!!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: this is not for small kids!!!! I bought this for my 5yr old and my husband can nearly get it to jump. My husband is 5'5" and 160lbs
customer_reviews.author: Ky

product_meta.title: Razor Gogo Pogo Stick
product_meta.description:
* It's a bouncing fun time with the GoGo Pogo from Razor®. Look at him go!
 * Lightweight aluminum frame is water and high-impact resistant. 
 * Foam handlebar grips for comfort. 
 * Durable foot pegs are foldable and replaceable.
 * Rubber tip for grip.
 * Patented folding system makes it easy to carry.
 * For ages 6 and up. 
 * Maximum rider weight: 140 lbs. 
 * Imported. 
 * Measurements: *  Weight: 5 lbs 2 oz
    *  Board Width: 12 in
    *  Height from ground: 40 in
feature_bullets: A new twist on an old classic
Features a fully enclosed spring system with low-friction bushings
Foldable and more portable then ever before
Lightweight aluminum frame construction with folding footrests
Also features folding handlebars and foam grips for comfort
